result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Savante L. Hamilton

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 8:49 am 
INCLUDES 19CF380 AND 22CF906. 
State appears by ADA Rory McGarry; Def appears in person with Atty John Wallace. 
Date and time was set for plea/sentencing hearing. 
OTR: 8:50 am BOTR: 9:18 am  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW. 

State to e-file amended information in 19CF380. 
State moves to: 
In 19CF380: Cts. 1 & 4>>D&RI. 
                   : Add Ct. 5 (4th Degree SA) pursuant to 940.225(3m). 
In 22CF906: Cts. 1-3>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 19CF380: Ct. 2 (False Imprisonment/DA)>>GUILTY. 
                   : Ct. 3 (Battery/DA)>>GUILTY. 
                   : Ct. 5 (4th Degree SA)>>GUILTY. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 

COURT ORDERS: 
In 19CF380: Ct. 2>>SWH for 3 years probation - ADDITIONAL CONDITION: 6 months MCJ imposed and STAYED for rule violations. 
                   : Ct. 3>>SWH for 2 years probation - ADDITIONAL CONDITIONS: 30 days MCJ and 30 hours CS imposed and STAYED for rule violations. 
                   : Ct. 5>>SWH for 2 years probation. 
COURT ORDERS as CONDITIONS ON ALL>>sign up and successfully complete SAFE program; sex offender treatment as deemed appropriate by dept; assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; no contact with CL unless approved by agent; DNA sample/surcharge; CC including 2 DA surcharges. 

COURT finds the def entitled to 4 days credit. 
Probation Review set for 11/18/2022 at 1:15 pm. 
Adj: 9:31 am

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 10:30 am 
INCLUDES 19CF380 AND 22CF906. 
State appears by ADA Rory McGarry; Deft appears in person with Atty John Wallace by Zoom Video. 
Parties have an agreement. 
COURT changes Jury Status Hrg to plea hrg on 9/7/2022.

Clerk Amanda

Information to be E-filed.  R/W; R/J. 

PLEA >> NOT GUILTY;

Jury Trial on September 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.
